body:
*Description*:
The admin page has some nice functionality in it, but could be trivially made much easier to use:

- all commands should be links
- mutating commands should be a POST so a crawler doesn't alter state (or quit)
- stats could be just delivered as text rather than html (changing content-type)
- simple table layout

optionally it could be css-styled but just having it be functional would be nice.

E.g. this:

Command | Description
-- | --
[/](http://example.com/) | admin home page
[/certs](http://example.com/certs) | print certs on machine
[/clusters](http://example.com/clusters) | upstream cluster status
[/cpuprofiler](http://example.com/cpuprofiler) | enable/disable the CPU profiler
[/healthcheck/fail](http://example.com/healthcheck/fail) | cause the server to fail health checks
[/healthcheck/ok](http://example.com/healthcheck/ok) | cause the server to pass health checks
[/hot_restart_version](http://example.com/hot_restart_version) | print the hot restart compatability version
[/listeners](http://example.com/listeners) | print listener addresses
[/logging](http://example.com/logging) | query/change logging levels
[/quitquitquit](http://example.com/quitquitquit) | exit the server
[/reset_counters](http://example.com/reset_counters) | reset all counters to zero
[/routes](http://example.com/routes) | print out currently loaded dynamic HTTP route tables
[/server_info](http://example.com/server_info) | print server version/status information
[/stats](http://example.com/stats) | print server stats

Rather than this:

envoy admin commands: /certs: print certs on machine /clusters: upstream cluster status /cpuprofiler: enable/disable the CPU profiler /healthcheck/fail: cause the server to fail health checks /healthcheck/ok: cause the server to pass health checks /hot_restart_version: print the hot restart compatability version /listeners: print listener addresses /logging: query/change logging levels /quitquitquit: exit the server /reset_counters: reset all counters to zero /routes: print out currently loaded dynamic HTTP route tables /server_info: print server version/status information /stats: print server stats

labels.description: Feature requests. Not bugs or questions.
labels.name: enhancement

title: admin page could be a little more user-friendly
